review: the best part of the game is when the cheaters break you into buying cheats

I don't know what to say, other than it's a fun game that doesn't follow many of the rules that other games are ensnared within. I don't know many people my age who play this game, but If your grandfather says that people his age don't play games like gta v, tell him that's why old folks get a reputation for being delicate. ... I haven't figured out most of the control details yet, but it hasn't stopped me from completing missions so far.  I tried to write something useful here, but I think I am going to keep playing and try this again later, when I have accumulated more experience.
i play this game because of the fancy shoe store and the nice people on the streets at night
